nl.esciencecenter.esight.models

Class GeoSphere

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.models.Model
      • nl.esciencecenter.esight.models.GeoSphere

  • public class GeoSphere
extends Model
    A sphere implementation based on a number of latitude and longitude divisions.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeoSphere

        public GeoSphere(int latRibs,
         int lonRibs,
         float radius,
         boolean texCoordsIn3D)
        Constructor for GeoSphere, prepares the attributes for this model and makes it ready to be initialized.
        Parameters:
        latRibs - The number of desired ribs in the latitude (north-south) direction.
        lonRibs - The number of desired ribs in the longitude (east-west) direction.
        radius - The radius of the sphere (assumed to be in 0.0 to 1.0 range)
        texCoordsIn3D - Flag for possible 3d texture coordinates.
